e8e3942f-2478-48bf-9457-e967d873de83 | lsc = | icon = Icon Engwithan Dig Site.png }} '''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [location](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireWorldMap/) in {{poe2}}. ## Background This former Engwithan combat arena has been unearthed by the [VTC](/vtc/) in pursuit of luminous adra and converted into a major adra refining center. That is, until the reborn Eothas literally stomped through the area, consuming the people's souls and exploiting the adra. ## Points of interest * You come across a familiar sight immediately after entering: Ashen husk, left behind by Eothas' sucking out their souls. With [Xoti](/xoti/) in the party, she will offer to perform a ritual to guide souls to the afterlife... Except Eothas sucked out their souls. You can explain that With 5 Intellect or Metaphysics 3. Allowing her a little indulgence helps with your relationship with her. * The road along the rim of the excavation leads through a number of plants and a ladder you can take down. The first level of the stands is mostly empty, except for [Gosha](/gosha/) (abandoned cat) lurking in their northern part. The side exit leads to the ancient training hall (the interior of the location). * The lower section, just above the fighting pit, has a few wurms and an exit to the luminous adra pool. The husks have minor amounts of cash, while the desk holds a [scrawled note ](/scrawledNoteDigSite/). * In the fighting pit are several young panthers and the local animancers, locked inside a cage. The cage was built to protect them from surges in the luminous adra - and proved to be useful for protection against Eothas and his soul-sucking abilities. Furthermore, you'll meet a familiar face among the animancers, Engferth. * To advance the quest and figure out what happened to Oderisi, you need to visit the [arena sub-level](/arenaSubLevel/). ###### Interiors * There are three interiors at the dig site, all part of the same map. The ancient training hall has the [Bracers of Accuracy](/bracersOfAccuracy/) and a few skeletal warriors, plus a wealth of fire traps (good for experience, less so for your health). * The luminous adra pool is where the company excavated adra for processing. It has minor, but valuable loot, some brine imps, and a wurm. * The foreman's office holds, well, the foreman's workspace, and contains the [note to Foreman](/noteToForeman/) and a [Champion's Medallion](/championsMedallion/). ## Characters * [Benessa](/benessa/): The leader of the animancers. * [Engferth](/aloth/): Hidden inside the cage. ## Loot * [Gosha](/gosha/) - "Deserted Cat": On the upper level of the stands in the north. * [Bracers of Accuracy](/bracersOfAccuracy/): In the ancient training hall.
